articles.title: But Daddy, the Grammys Didn’t Love The Tortured Poets Department - Vulture
articles.description: In a rare documented L for Taylor Swift, she lost all six of her Grammy nominations for ‘The Tortured Poets Department.’ But, hey, looks like she had a good time.
articles.content: Taylor Swift doesnt normally lose. She won the 2024 Super Bowl and she wasnt even playing. But at the 2025 Grammy Awards on February 2, she went home with a big ol goose egg. The Tortured Poets Depar… [+745 chars]
